remarks: An alternative expression for a Dirichlet-weighted von Mangoldt sum in terms of the Möbius function.  Equation 9.4.11 of [Shapiro], p. 377.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2016.)
statement:
rpvmasum.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Z ) $.
rpvmasum.a $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
rpvmasum.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.d $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
rpvmasum.1 $e |- .1. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
dchrisum.b $e |- ( ph -> X e. D ) $.
dchrisum.n1 $e |- ( ph -> X =/= .1. ) $.
dchrvmasum.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR+ ) $.
dchrvmasumlem1 $p |- ( ph -> sum_ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) ( ( X ` ( L ` n ) ) x. ( ( Lam ` n ) / n ) ) = sum_ d e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) ( ( ( X ` ( L ` d ) ) x. ( ( mmu ` d ) / d ) ) x. sum_ m e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` ( A / d ) ) ) ( ( X ` ( L ` m ) ) x. ( ( log ` m ) / m ) ) ) ) $.
